simplified: 野火烧不尽，春风吹又生

pronunciation.pinyin: yě huǒ shāo bù jìn , chūn fēng chuī yòu shēng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: ye3 huo3 shao1 bu4 jin4 , chun1 feng1 chui1 you4 sheng1

details.simplified: 野火烧不尽，春风吹又生
details.traditional: 野火燒不盡，春風吹又生

meanings.value: even a prairie fire cannot destroy the grass - it grows again when the breeze blows (proverb)
abbr. to 野火春風|野火春风[ye3 huo3 chun1 feng1]
meanings.traditional: bbr. to 野火春風|野火春风
